body_text.text: In the 1 September 2016 issue of the Journal, in the article by Assiri et al (Assiri AM, Midgley CM, Abedi GR, et al. Epidemiology of a novel recombinant Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus in humans in Saudi Arabia. J Infect Dis 2016; 214:712–21), affiliation 2 for Abdulaziz Bin Saeed should read “Department of Family and Community Medicine, College of Medicine, King Saud University” (not “Department of Family and Community Medicine, King Saud Medical City”). The authors regret this error.
